title: ranga nayaka rakshhimpumayya
sahitya:
ranganAyaka rakSimpumayya ratsa sEya nEla raghuvamsha nAtha

anupallavi

 pankaja ramaNa bhava tAraka shrI rangapurAdhIsha shrngAra nilaya

caraNam

 kAlaharaNa mEla karuNAlavAla cAla nammitini sharambu nIvE nIla
nIradAbha nirupama gAtra shIla tyAgarAja nuta bhOgi shAyi
